actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources.

official_title: To authorize the Corps of Engineers to provide flood flight assistance to the Ventura County Flood Control District with respect to Santa Paula Creek, Ventura, California.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Army to provide flood fight assistance to the Ventura County Flood Control District, upon the request of such district and when its flood warning system predicts a peak flood flow of greater than 16,000 cubic feet per second in Santa Paula Creek, near Santa Paula, California.

titles.title: To authorize the Corps of Engineers to provide flood flight assistance to the Ventura County Flood Control District with respect to Santa Paula Creek, Ventura, California.
